titles.title: C096 - yi din hun eliyaa-ko jhaiň (with english)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
यी दिन हुन्‌ एलियाको झैँ
वचन प्रचार गर्ने
यी दिन हुन्‌ प्रभुको दास मोशाको झैँ
धार्मिकता स्थापित गर्ने,
These are the days of Elijah
Declaring the word of the Lord:
And these are the days of Your servant Moses
Righteousness being restored.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
यस्तै यी दिन हुन्‌ ठूलो परीक्षा,
अनिकाल, लडाइँका
हामी हौं उजाड-स्थानमा कराउने स्वर
प्रभुको बाटो बनाऔं।
And though these are days of great trial
Of famine and darkness and sword
Still, we are the voice in the desert crying
'Prepare ye the way of the Lord!'

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
हेर उनी आउँछन्‌ बादलमा
सूर्यझैँ चम्कँदै तुरहीको आवाजमा
चर्को गरी कराऊ छुटकाराको वर्ष,
सियोनबाट अझै आउँछ उद्धार।
Behold He comes riding on the clouds
Shining like the sun at the trumpet call
Lift your voice, it's the year of jubilee
And out of Zion's hill salvation comes.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
यी दिन हुन्‌ इजकिएलका झैँ,
सुक्खा हड्डी शरीर बन्‍‌ने,
यी दिन हुन्‌ प्रभुको दास दाऊदको झैँ,
प्रशंसा गर्ने, मन्दिर बन्‍‌ने
These are the days of Ezekiel
The dry bones becoming as flesh
And these are the days of Your servant David
Rebuilding a temple of praise.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
अनि यी दिन हुन्‌ कटनीका
संसारका खेतहरू
हामी हौं प्रभुका
खेतका खेताला वचन घोषणा गर्ने।
These are the days of the harvest
The fields are as white in Your world
And we are the labourers in Your vineyard
Declaring the word of the Lord!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
यह्वेझैँ छैन ईश्वर
There's no God like Jehovah!
